title: is pan card necessary while taking admission
content: Do we need a pancard of student while taking admission in website they mentioned about it and the said it's mandatory.

comments.body: No they never asked for mine
They did ask PAN card of any one parent during PESSAT admission. If you are getting admission through CET, I have no idea about it. :)
Nope, they don't ask for PAN card when getting admission thru KCET
Is attestation required for 2 sets of photo copies(kcet)

•  I already had attested photocopies, so they took it. Doesn't really matter. Some photocopies had no attestation. In those scenarios I had to self-attest.

•  Take atleast 5 passport and 5 stamp size pics for admission. I almost f'ed up that part.

•  About the anti-ragging affidavit, nothing was asked.

10th and 12 th marks card 

Income certificate

Rural study certificate

Hall ticket kcet

Leaving certificate

Stamp size and passport size photo 

2 sets of photo copies 
Am I missing something other than challan and admission order?

10th and 12th marks card take originals and photocopies.

2 copies of admission order (idk why but i luckily had 2)

And yeah I think this will be enough.

All the best for a great life in PES University!
